#summary Use case for removing an existing Lexicon entry.
#labels UseCase,Phase-Design

= Introduction =

*Description:*

Removes an existing Lexicon entry from the database.

*Preconditions:*
 # The user has the role of Administrator.
 # The user is logged into the administration interface.
 # The user is viewing the Lexicon Management page.

*Postconditions:*
 # The selected Lexicon entry will be removed from the database.

= Basic Course of Action =

 # User wants to remove a Lexicon entry.
 # User selects the Remove option for the chosen entry.
 # The system displays a confirmation dialog verifying that the user wants to remove the Lexicon entry.
 # User confirms that he wants the Lexicon entry removed.
 # The system deletes the Lexicon entry from the database.
 # The system displays a success page to the user.
 # Use case ends.
